metadata.title: CVE-2024-21823 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
Hardware logic with insecure de-synchronization in Intel(R) DSA andIntel(R) IAA for some Intel(R) 4th or 5th generation Xeon(R) processors mayallow an authorized user to potentially enable denial of service via localaccess.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-21823` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.8.0-35-generic - 6.8.0-35.35
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-35-generic - 6.8.0-35.35
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-35-generic-64k - 6.8.0-35.35
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1010-aws - 6.8.0-1010.10
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1009-azure - 6.8.0-1009.9
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1009-gcp - 6.8.0-1009.10
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1005-gke - 6.8.0-1005.8
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1006-ibm - 6.8.0-1006.6
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-35-lowlatency - 6.8.0-35.35.1
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-35-lowlatency-64k - 6.8.0-35.35.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1006-oracle - 6.8.0-1006.6
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1006-oracle-64k - 6.8.0-1006.6
No subscription required

linux-image-6.8.0-1005-raspi - 6.8.0-1005.5
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1007-oem - 6.8.0-1007.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1006-intel - 6.8.0-1006.13
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.8.0-35.35').
linux-aws package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.8.0-1010.10').
linux-azure package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.8.0-1009.9').
linux-gcp package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.8.0-1009.10').
linux-gke package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.8.0-1005.8').
linux-ibm package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.8.0-1006.6').
linux-lowlatency package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.8.0-35.35.1').
linux-oracle package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.8.0-1006.6').
linux-raspi package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.8.0-1005.5').
linux-oem-6.8 package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.8.0-1007.7').
linux-intel package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.8.0-1006.13').
linux-raspi-realtime package in realtime/noble is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.8.0-2004.4').
linux-realtime package in realtime/noble is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.8.1-1002.2').
